text:
Omniex.io | San Francisco & Santa Monica | Full-Time | Onsite | https://omniex.io

Omniex is a fintech crypto startup building a complete front-to-back office solution for institutions to trade crypto-assets.

We are hiring for multiple roles, including front end UX/UI, developers using React and Node, developers for our back end in C++ and python, product management, QA, office manager.

See our careers page: https://omniex.io/careers/

You can email me directly: jhenderson@omniex.io
